room_title: Escape room "Pirates" by Questburgh Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: Our group included 2 kids under the age of 5. They really got into it! I hope they will devise another game that will allow younger kids to participate. Staff are very nice!

room_title: Escape room "Pirates" by Questburgh Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: My husband and I went with a group with two other couples. We were challenged and had a lot of fun! We did the Pirate themed escape room, were given some hints but definitely had to think outside the box! Fun night!

room_title: Escape room "Pirates" by Questburgh Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: We did the Pirate room and loved it. This was a great way to work and solve as a group of mixed ages. Fun for the whole family!
